value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral STRUGGLES vs Protoss? (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series between Serral (Zerg) and Gerald (Protoss). The games in this series are macro games, Serral's speciality, and yet he struggles against Gerald's macro Protoss style. value.title: StarCraft 2: SUPER-SATURATED BASES - GuMiho vs Solar on Lazarus Wastes!
value.excerpt: Lazarus Wastes is one of the winning maps in StarCraft 2 with the Team Liquid Map Contest 17 (TLMC17). Map is made by HoperONE and has a few unique features.
